name: Clone Pinball
description:
A fast-paced pinball clone with, er...  
human clones instead of pinballs.

Instructions and Controls

  • Title screen: type your name (press ENTER to toggle edition) then click to start.
  • Game screen
Flippers:
Hit the clones to send them flyingA - left flippers
D - right flippersDrag/Swipe:
Give clones a little bumpDrag/swipe with left mouse buttonPause/UnpauseESC

Scoring

  • You score points by collecting stars, touching yellow pads and cloning players.
Yellow pad10 (on hit)Yellow star50Pink star200Clone creation trigger300 (on activation)

Clone Creation Trigger

  • Activating the Clone creation trigger creates new human clones.
    • Every time you activate it, it creates one more clone (i.e. the first time will create one clone, the second one will create two clones, etc.)
    • The clone trigger gets an ever longer cooldown each time, after triggering it.

Game Over

  • Game is over when all clones die. A clone dies if:
    • It touches a spike 
    • It goes off screen.
    • It gets stuck for some seconds.

Credits

  • Concept, programming, graphics, music by me.
  • Sounds at freesounds.org
  • Fonts at dafont.org
